{{also|藥局|药局}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|やく|k1=やっ|きょく|yomi=on}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|やっきょく|kyu=藥局}}

# [[drugstore]] {{qualifier|no prescription required: over-the-counter medicines only}}
# [[pharmacy]] {{qualifier|prescription required}}

====Usage notes====
The term 薬局 can be ambiguous as to whether a doctor's prescription is required, much as the English term {{m|en|drugstore}}. When referring specifically to a store from which prescription medicines are bought, use the term {{ja-r|調剤薬局|ちょうざい やっきょく}}.

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|調剤薬局|ちょうざい やっきょく}}: [[pharmacy]], [[dispensary]] {{qualifier|prescription required}}

====See also====
* {{ja-r|薬剤師|やくざいし}}: [[pharmacist]]
